order_id.description: Unique identifier for each order transaction

customer_id.description: Foreign key reference to customer who placed the order

product_id.description: Foreign key reference to the product being ordered

order_date.description: Date and time when the order was placed by customer

order_amount.description: Total monetary value of the order in USD

order_status.description: Current status of the order in fulfillment process

created_at.description: System timestamp when record was inserted into database

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for each customer account

email.description: Primary email address for customer communications

signup_date.description: Date when customer first created their account

customer_status.description: Current status of customer account (A=Active, I=Inactive)

product_id.description: Unique identifier for each product in catalog

price.description: Current selling price of the product

created_date.description: Date when product was added to catalog

is_active.description: Whether product is currently available for sale

record_id.description: Unique identifier for each dummy data record

source_system_id.description: Identifier of the source system that generated this record

version_flag.description: Version flag indicating the algorithm version used

region.description: Geographic region where this data applies

population_id.description: Foreign key to population segment this record belongs to

priority_score.description: Calculated priority score for this record (0-100)

variable_identifier.description: Name/code of the variable being measured

coefficient_raw.description: Raw coefficient value before type conversion

processed_timestamp.description: Timestamp when this record was processed

population_name.description: Descriptive name of the population segment

active_flag.description: Whether this population segment is currently active

created_date.description: Date when this population segment was created

version_name.description: Version name used for joins with dummy data

priority_level.description: Priority level for this dimension entry

created_date.description: Date when dimension record was created

updated_date.description: Date when dimension record was last updated
